scripts.gtt: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.gtt.api.spec.ts -g gtt_order
scripts.gttcancel: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.gtt.api.spec.ts -g gtt_cancel
scripts.gtt1: npm run pull-data && export kcid=1 && npx playwright test tests/trade.gtt.api.spec.ts -g gtt_order
scripts.gtt2: npm run pull-data && export kcid=2 && npx playwright test tests/trade.gtt.api.spec.ts -g gtt_order
scripts.gtt3: npm run pull-data && export kcid=3 && npx playwright test tests/trade.gtt.api.spec.ts -g gtt_order
scripts.amo: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.amo.api.spec.ts -g amo_order
scripts.amocancel: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.amo.api.spec.ts -g amo_cancel
scripts.reg: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.reg.api.spec.ts -g reg_order
scripts.regcancel: npm run pull-data && npx playwright test tests/trade.reg.api.spec.ts -g reg_cancel
